apps.name: MarkdownEditor

apps.title: Link Shortener

apps.name: WordElements
apps.title: Word Elements Search

apps.description: Chat on a frequency, and only those on the same frequency can read your messages.

apps.name: multitab
apps.title: Multi-Tab Browser
apps.description: Compare websites or evade history tracking with multiple tabs. Sites not allowing iframing will not work.
